Name: DC select
comments: do not place terminal, just connect pads via wire if needed

Name: 2k2
comments: resistor 1/4W, 2k2 only if in combination with R9, else 100 Ohm

Name: 3k3
comments: resistor 1/4W, only needed if input level is 5V, then this forms a resistor divider network together with R8

Name: 1p
comments: Not needed - it can be placed to filter high frequency interference if needed
